I'll be having a reading from my new book "21st Century Fix" and book signing on March 3rd (Sunday) at 3pm at Union Avenue Books, downtown Knoxville.

New Press Room rule:
    * A non-classified version of the Presidential Daily Briefing shall be  provided to reporters so at least someone will read it.

New Press Room Decorum rules:
 * A laugh track will be added to replies when a  false  statement is repeated after being debunked by Politifact, FactCheck, or Snopes.
   * The term Fake News will be reserved only for Comedy News programs, not ones with which one has a grudge.

New press room decorum rules:
   * No person shall refer to another by a derisive nickname such as low-IQ, crooked, little, boring, sleepy, or Pocahantas.
   * "President" only shall be used for  persons who acquired the office but lost the popular tally by two million votes+.

My new book is out. "21st Century Fix" is a collection of columns. It can be found online. I'm starting promotional events this Saturday 10 am at Gloria Johnson's gathering for canvassing, 311 Morgan St.  Anyone writing a check for $20 or more to her campaign gets a signed copy.

Trump Lie: wrong, again, on inner-city crime stats

Trump Lie #4: Selling insurance across state lines.  Can be done now, just have to abide by that state's rules, not worst state regs.
Trump Lie#4: HRC campaign did not start birtherism.  Fact checkers keep correcting this.  Now he's rambling through other lies & projections
Trump Lie#3: Now he's upset at HRC for being assigned as a defense attorney.  She has laughed only at the absurdity of the question.
Trump Lie#2: Groping women as he noted is sexual assault.
Trump Lie: We didn't give money to Iran.  Recouped their frozen funds.
TKO for HRC
Trump Lie: Denies saying misogynist things.  All on tape.

Trump just advocated an intl. war crime.  Taking oil, warfare for plunder.  Falsely claimed again opposed Iraq war.
Trump Lie: ICE endorsed him.  Govt. agencies don't endorse.  An ICE employees union endorsed.
Trump Lie: Denied praising Putin.  Videotape again.
Trump Lie: Clinton pushed birtherism.  Already debunked by every fact checker who examined it.
Trump lies: stop & frisk constitutional and lowered crime rate (nope)
Trump Lie: He denied saying he would try to negotiate down national debt.  He did.  There's tape.
Trump Lies: Illegal Server (nope), You don't learn a lot from tax returns (sure do).
Trump Lie: audit precludes releasing his taxes.  Heck, even Nixon released taxes while under audit.
Trump Lie: Obama doubled national debt.  Nope.  Debt is compounding from two wars paid for on national credit card.  Obama cut deficit.
Trump Lie: He has doubted climate change and called it a Chinese conspiracy.
Trump Lie: Built a great company from a small start, actually would be worth more if he left his money in T-bills.
Trump Lie: Hillary and I agree on child care.  Nope.  She wants paid leave for new parents.  He ignores fathers.
